column1:
API Knowledge:
java.io.DataInputStream can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Reading Primitive Data Types; 2) Reading Strings; 3) Reading Bytes; 4) Reading Other Primitive Types
java.io.DataOutputStream can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Writing primitive data types; 2) Writing binary data; 3) Writing multi-byte values; 4) Flushing and closing
Claim: Based on the above knowledge, there is a task scenario that requires java.io.DataInputStream and java.io.DataOutputStream to cooperate.,Answer: Correct

API Knowledge:
java.lang.Integer can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Representation and Conversion; 2) Parsing and Formatting; 3) Getting the Minimum and Maximum Values; 4) Hash Code Generation
java.lang.String can accomplish the following tasks:\n"
1) String Creation and Manipulation; 2) String Comparison; 3) Regular Expressions; 4) Character Extraction
Claim: Based on the above knowledge, there is a task scenario that requires java.lang.Integer and java.lang.String to cooperate.,Answer: Incorrect

API Knowledge:
java.util.Date can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Storing and representing dates and times; 2) Parsing and formatting date strings; 3) Comparison and manipulation; 4) Converting to other data types
java.lang.String can accomplish the following tasks:
1) String Creation and Manipulation; 2) String Comparison; 3) Regular Expressions; 4) Character Extraction
Claim: Based on the above knowledge, there is a task scenario that requires java.util.Date and java.lang.String to cooperate.,Answer: Incorrect

API Knowledge:
java.io.BufferReader can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Reading Text Files; 2) Line-by-Line Reading; 3) Parsing Text Data; 4) Input Stream Wrapping; 5) Reading Console Input
java.io.BufferedWriter can accomplish the following tasks:
1) Efficient writing; 2) Writing text data; 3) Line-oriented writing; 4) Flushing; 5) Character encoding
Claim: Based on the above knowledge, there is a task scenario that requires java.io.BufferReader and java.io.BufferedWriter to cooperate.,Answer: Correct
